body_html:
@mrry I've the same issue! posted a question on stack overflow with the code that I've tried https://stackoverflow.com/questions/51219374/tensorflow-distributed-createsession-still-waiting-for-response-from-worker-j

I've just tried to run both ps and worker on the same cluster and yet still getting the same message! any idea how to fix/debug that?
